title: Print, "The Family Record", August 28, 1875
medium: Wood engraving printed in black ink on paper
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Cora E. Wilson
description: Vertical view of an interior with a seated man writing in a large book on top of a table as a woman looks on while holding an ink bottle.  At left cradle holding a baby rests on the floor and on the back wall a portrait of a man in mid-18th century costume hangs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "The Family Record", August 28, 1875.
August 28, 1875. Wood engraving printed in black ink on paper. Gift of Cora Wilson. 1939-70-10.
